name: Dragonsblood
description:
Dragonsblood

In the year of the Rising Serpent, four reclusive magicians seized the opportunity to enact a scheme centuries in the making. Their act was a great affront to dragonkind, and they could not let these four fiends complete their baleful rituals.

Alas, dragons are forbidden from acting against mankind directly. It was fortunate that they had cultivated a friendship with a certain clan for times such as these. The young dragon Altair sought out Izra, a descendant of this bloodline, to request her aid in halting their malefactors' ploy.

Izra accepted without hesitation, as the custom of her clan demands. The pair headed into the desert, to seek out the hiding place of the four magicians. This is their story...

Controls

The three control layouts are all active from the start, just pick the one you are most comfortable with and get going!

Details

This game is a 2D Metroidvania style platformer and it includes the following features:

  • Non-linear world design
  • Five areas, five bosses
  • Four abilities
  • Four more optional abilities
  • An in-game timer for speedrunners
  • Item collection tracking for completionists
  • 30+ minutes of gameplay
  • Replayability!
